data.message: I know the chances of you reading this are slim to none.. Iv send a few letters to your "fan mail" address but whether or not you've read them I guess you haven't.. Your music (especially slim shady) has got me through some tough times.. If you did sell your souls to the devil I hope your immortal.. I couldn't imagine a world without your lyrical genius.. Everything iv accomplished I feel like I owe it to you 👊🏼 from nowhere to now here your a god.. And I hope you believe that as much as I do 🙏🏻 #letstradeshoes
